sen.j: 丸本物では『仮名手本忠臣蔵』のお軽、塩冶判官、お石、『義経千本櫻』の静御前、『妹背山婦女庭訓』お三輪、『新版歌祭文』（野崎村）のお光、『攝州合邦辻』（合邦庵室）の玉手御前、『菅原伝授手習鑑』の桜丸、『勧進帳』や『一谷嫩軍記・熊谷陣屋』の義経などが当たり役であった。
sen.e: He gained a reputation for roles such as Okaru, Enya hangan and Oishi of "Kanadehon Chushingura," Shizuka Gozen of "Yoshitsune Senbonzakura" (Yoshitsune and One Thousand Cherry Trees), Omiwa of "Imoseyama (Mt. Imose) Onna Teikin (An Exemplary Tale of Womanly Virtue)," Omitsu of "Shinpan utazaimon" (The Love of Osome and Hisamatsu), Tamate-Gozen of "Gappo Anjitsu (hermitage of Gappo), Sesshu Gappo ga Tsuji (A Kabuki Drama of Unfettered Evil)," Sakuramaru of "Sugawara Denju Tenarai Kagami" (Sugawara's secrets of calligraphy) and Yoshitsune of "Kanjincho" (The Subscription List) and "Jinya KUMAGAI, Ichi no Tani Futabagunki (Chronicle of the Battle of Ichinotani)" in the area of maruhonmono (Kabuki drama of joruri (puppet-play) origin).

sen.j: 純歌舞伎では『青砥稿花紅彩画』（白浪五人男）の弁天小僧、『与話情浮名横櫛』（切られ与三）のお富、『新皿屋舗月雨暈』（魚屋宗五郎）の女房おはま、そして無類の貴公子ぶりを見せた『新薄雪物語』（薄雪）の左衛門などの世話物を得意とした。
sen.e: In the area of pure kabuki, he was very good at plays dealing with the lives of ordinary people, playing Bentenkozo of "Aotozoshi hana no nishikie" (Picture of flower of Aorozoshi) or "Shiranami Gonin Otoko" (The Five Shiranami Men), Otomi of "Yohanasake Ukinano Yokogushi"or "Kirare Yosa" (Scarface Yosa), Ohama the wife of "Shinsarayashiki Tsuki no Amagasa" or "Sakanaya Sogoro," and, above all, Saemon of "Shin Usuyuki Monogatari" (The Tale of Usuyuki) or "Usuyuki", which he played with unmatched nobleness.
